scripts.cloudapps:api: npm run cloudapps --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudapps/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudcore:api: npm run cloudcore --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudcore/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloud_admin:api: npm run cloud_admin --spec 'cypress/integration/cloud_admin/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloud_admin:ui: npm run cloud_admin --spec 'cypress/integration/cloud_admin/ui/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudprinter-web-site:api: npx cypress run --config-file cloudprinter-web-site.json --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudprinter-web-site/api/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.cloudprinter-web-site:ui: npx cypress run --config-file cloudprinter-web-site.json --spec 'cypress/integration/cloudprinter-web-site/ui/**/*' 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.log-report-to-file: cypress run --quiet 1> test-results.txt || true && sh echo_message.sh
scripts.clean:reports: rm -R -f cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test-with-report: npm run clean:reports && npm run log-report-to-file &&  npm run posttest
